function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective health and safety management for facility users","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion within the facility","Mitigation":"Integration of health and safety monitoring through BIM data from on-site sensors","Technologies":"Building Information Model (BIM), on-site sensors","People":"Facility users, health and safety professionals","Owner":"Facility managers, health and safety professionals"},{"Description":"Inefficient design flexibility in response to crisis situations","Impact":"Inability to quickly adapt facilities to evolving needs in a crisis","Mitigation":"Incorporating flexibility into design planning using BIM and value management","Technologies":"Building Information Model (BIM), value management tools","People":"Asset owners, designers","Owner":"Asset owners, designers"},{"Description":"Overwhelmed traditional hospitals leading to makeshift hospital development","Impact":"Potential overwhelmed traditional hospitals leading to makeshift hospital development","Mitigation":"Preparedness for unexpected events through flexible design planning and value management","Technologies":"Building Information Model (BIM), value management tools","People":"Healthcare providers, government","Owner":"Asset owners, healthcare providers"}]}
